DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective clinical study collect clinical data support FDA 510 ( k ) submission Nidek Specular Microscope CEM-530 . The secondary objective evaluate adverse event find clinical study .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Study Specular Microscope Cell Density , Coefficient Variation , Hexagonality Corneal Thickness
DOC.criteria: NonPathologic : Male female subject 18 80 year old full legal capacity volunteer date inform consent sign . Pathologic : Male female subject 29 80 year old full legal capacity volunteer date inform consent sign .
